review: It's an amazing movie. Storyline direction presentation was very good. Actors acting were brilliant  specially vinaya phathaks acting was amazing . They have given us good message that till last breath we should  lead our life with positivity and happily. Then we can show our happiness face to other people . Songs were real good. This movie remind me rajesh khannas and amitabh bachan anand movie same topic.

I must have seen thousands of movies till date,i can easily say that it will always be in the top three among that all;it has a heart-warming storyline,leaves you with a beautiful messsage.
          You never know what will happen next in your life,life is not forever,so just make the best out of it.

Well it's remind me Anand movie of rajesh khanna, it's seems it's inspired from that platform. During those days people might not have wish bucket list ehich they wanna live . nowdays people have it.  Very good movie and Rajat pathhak is real gem of bollywood.

Very interesting movie. Better to watch in home may be alone and not in theater. Movie is about the last 10 wishes of a person who is about to die in few months. How he finds happiness in life. Who will cry when you die.
I watched it today. It's an amazing movie very entertaining and a good messenger as well. I was not able to blink my eyes thorough the entire movie. 10/10. Highly recommend a must watch movie.
I can't cry even when I feel like doing so. But I have cried buckets when I saw this movie. You feel so good and begin to love your life after you finish watching this one.
I m crying.. I want to cry so loud that every person should hear it especially those who exploited my life. Yes it's me. And it is my life... Unfortunately
I loved this movie,   later I cried.. My wife too saw.. She dint like.. U know  she ditched me,   got married to other person...
I never seen this type of movie in my whole  life, it was outstanding performance by all actors specily Vinay pathak... üíØ/üíØ Rating.
